metadata.title: CVE-2017-14160 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The bark_noise_hybridmp function in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted mp4 file.

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-1').
